EmailTemplate.name: RE: FW: MBO Partners Inquiry (1321569450.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: FW: MBO Partners Inquiry (1321569450.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi David,
Thank you for following up! I will follow up with you in the new year, but if in the meantime you would like more information on MBO or decide that working with us is the direction you want to take, please do not hesitate to reach out to me and I will be happy to assist you.
If I do not speak with you before then, have a great holiday season!
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: David Hess [mailto:davidshess@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, November 17, 2011 2:58 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: FW: MBO Partners Inquiry
Nicolette, I am not sure we are a fit for MBO since we are trying to build a brand. I will reach out to you, if it makes sense in the future or you can call in January. Regards, David
On Thu, Nov 17, 2011 at 12:30 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi David,
Some time ago you requested information regarding the services offered by MBO Partners. Now might not be the right time for you. If you would like to simply reply to this email with a good time in the future to reach out - I will make sure I follow up with you then.
Regards, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Thursday, November 03, 2011 4:08 PM To: 'davidshess@gmail.com' Subject: MBO Partners Inquiry
Hi David,
Thank you for your interest in MBO Partners. I received your information from Christina Rojas and I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services or answer any specific questions you may have.
You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube: http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4.
I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners!
Have a great day, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
